DOC.brief_title: Monolithic Zirconia Crowns Single Implants Molar Region : Multicenter Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: In majority study implant-supported restoration , considerable rate fracture veneer ceramic report . The clinical data restrict full-ceramic implant-supported reconstruction anterior region . No clinical data available performance full-ceramic restoration molar region . The use translucent monolithic zirconia implant-supported crown ( without veneer ceramic ) may reduce technical complication rate allow sufficient aesthetic result molar region . To date , clinical trial investigate monolithic zirconia crown single molar implant available . The primary outcome study technical complication rate . This outcome represent indicator prosthetic success implant-supported crown . The main biological secondary outcome marginal bone level , histological sign inflammation , presence pathogenic bacteria . Further outcome crown survival , wear crown antagonist .
